介绍
这个研究是测试的，关于民主类型的观点。
第一步
Read the following statements carefully and split them up into three piles: a pile for statements you tend to disagree with, a pile for cards you tend to agree with, and a pile for the rest.{br}{br}You can either drag the cards into one of the three piles or {b}press 1, 2, 3{/b} on your keyboard. Changes can be made later.{br}{br}If you want to read this instruction a second time, press the help-button at the bottom left corner. 仔细阅读下面的陈述，并把它们分成三堆:一堆是你倾向于不同意的陈述，一堆是你倾向于同意的卡片，还有一堆是其他的。fhbn(br)您可以将牌拖到三个牌堆中的一个或几个，可以修改。 (如果您想重读本说明书，请按左下角的帮助按钮。)
第二步
Take the cards from the "AGREE"-pile and arrange them on right side of the score sheet.{br}{br}Next, take the cards from the "DISAGREE"-pile and arrange them on the left side of the score sheet. Follow this procedure for all cards in the "AGREE"- and "DISAGREE"-piles.{br}{br}Finally, take the "NEUTRAL"-cards arrange them in the remaining open boxes of the score sheet. 从“同意”牌堆中取出卡片，并将它们排列在记分表的右侧。接下来，从“将它们排列在乐谱的左侧。对于“同意”和“不同意”牌堆中的所有牌，请遵循此程序。最后，把“中性”牌放在分数表的剩余空格中。
Give condition of instruction here
Text
第三步
Now you have placed all cards on the score sheet. Please go over your distribution once more and swap card positions cards if desired. 现在你已经把所有的牌放在记分表上了。请再次检查您的分配情况，如果需要的话，交换卡片位置卡片。
Give condition of instruction here
第四步
Please explain why you agree most or disagree most with the following statements you have placed below "+4" or "-4". 请您解释选择最同意或最不同意选项的理由
第五步
Finally, please answer the following questions regarding your background. 最后，请回答关于您的背景问题。
提交数据
您已经完成调查了，请立即提交您的数据。
数据提交失败，请再次提交。
